Dijkstra.description: Finds the shortest paths from a source to all vertices in the given graph

Binary-add.description: Tree algorithm that has maximum two child, right child has bigger value then parent's, left child has smaller value then parent's.

Binary-delete.description: Tree algorithm that has maximum two child, right child has bigger value then parent's, left child has smaller value then parent's.

Binary-search.description: Tree algorithm that has maximum two child, right child has bigger value then parent's, left child has smaller value then parent's.

BinaryTree.description: Tree algorithm that has maximum two child, right child has bigger value then parent's, left child has smaller value then parent's.
